ValidationRule.description: If ROE Needed? is Yes, rep must select prior year, current year, or BOTH

ISPICKVAL( ROE_Needed__c ,"Yes") && ( NOT( ISPICKVAL( Plan_Year__c ,"Prior Year")) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Plan_Year__c ,"Current Year"))&& NOT( ISPICKVAL( Plan_Year__c ,"Both"))
)
